ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dark Age of Camelot
ygData.msgSnippet: It doesn t matter, it would be like so one remaking the white album, (or redoing Psycho, say...) I found the animated movie to be nearly perfect (I really love
ygData.messageBody:
It doesn't matter, it would be like so one remaking the white album, (or
redoing Psycho, say...)

I found the animated movie to be nearly perfect (I really love it that
much). Computer generated monsters will never be as scary as the Ring
Wraiths were. What are the chances whoever is playing Gandalf (anyone have
a cast list yet) is as much of a bastard as he was in the animated version?
And somehow I can't see being Mini Me (I forgot his real name) being as
appealing as Pippen was...

We'll see and again I hope I'm wrong :-)
